ValidationRule.description: DUPLICATE and being renamed properly. IWCN-766 Disallow the user from selecting the --None-- value of the Case Sub Stage
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Claim_Stage__c, "In Kankakee"), ISPICKVAL(Claim_Sub_Stage__c, ""), NOT ($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: None is an invalid selection for Case Sub Stage.
